product_name: REI Rainwall Rain Pants - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The toddler boys' REI Rainwall Rain Pants offer full-blown waterproof/breathable and windproof coverage for active little ones in the outdoors. Lightweight 2.5-layer ripstop REI-Elements(R)-rated nylon is waterproof, breathable and windproof to 60+ mph; seams are sealed to complete the protection. Elastic waistband with a drawcord offers a comfortable, adjustable fit. Articulated knees extend the range of motion; reinforced fabric helps resist abrasion. Elastic cuffs help pants slip easily over boot tops. Reflective trim offers increased visibility in low light. The toddler boys' REI Rainwall Rain Pants have a write-on ID label inside.
short_description: The toddler boys' REI Rainwall Rain Pants offer full-blown waterproof/breathable and windproof coverage for active little ones in the outdoors.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
